data.actual_result: the unread message stays even if you clicked the unread message at the channel list.
data.expected_result: the unread message disappears if the channel is declared as read.
data.short_description: new unread message from channel list appears and stays
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a channel in your server - try to experiment on scrolling the channel list down. make sure that the channel list is long enough to reproduce it properly - start chatting - watch out for unread messages in the channel list. click it and scroll down.
